thread.section_title: www.uberchild.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of www.uberchild.com | uberchild.com
thread.title: Barbara Lynn Bolton
thread.title_full: www.uberchild.com reviewed by Barbara Lynn Bolton

author: Barbara Lynn Bolton
title: Barbara Lynn Bolton
text: Quick delivery but delivery driver tried to deliver on a different day to that requested. He left a card stating the parcel had been left at a the local post office. Fine, except that when I went to collect it, no parcel!! Apparently it had been delivered to a totally different post office!!! I had then to travel to the other post office, park across a main road and carry the rather large box across - not easy especially as I had had a new knee a couple of months ago!! Apart from this the car seat looks good - not in my new car yet as still waiting for its delivery.
